acf.post_copy:
Shop one of these events at Alexandria Mall to
benefit breast cancer research:
Fit for the Cure, October 7 at Dillard’s
Dillard’s invites you to a Fit for the Cure event on Wednesday, October 5, 10 a.m. – 8 p.m. The event will be at the ladies’ lingerie department. When you allow a Dillard’s certified bra fitter to fit you into a Wacoal or b.tempt’d bra, Wacoal will donate $2 in your name to the Susan G. Komen Breast Cancer Foundation. No purchase necessary. However, if you do purchase a Wacoal or b.tempt’d bra during this event, Wacoal will donate another $2 in your name. To make a bra fitting appointment, call 318-445-9992. Also on this day, make a purchase of $80 or more of Wacoal or b.tempt’d products and receive a free makeup caddy and four piece beauty set. This offer is good while supplies last.
Cut for a Cause, October 9 at Ulta
Ulta is supporting Breast Cancer Awareness month with a special Cut for a Cause event on Sunday, October 9, 2016. The event will be held from 11 a.m. – 6 p.m. Choose from either a shampoo and haircut, a pink hair extension or a Microzone Express Facial for just $10 during this event. 100% of your purchase will benefit the Breast Cancer Research Foundation. For more information or to schedule an appointment, contact Ulta. to make an appointment , call 318-443-7016.
Clip for a Cure, October 15 at MasterCuts and Regis
A new style for you on October 15 will lead to more money for cancer research. Both Regis Salon and MasterCuts inside Alexandria Mall will host Clip for the Cure on Saturday, October 15, 2016. 10% of proceeds from every haircut on this day will be donated to the Regis Foundation for Breast Cancer Research. For more information visit ClipfortheCure.org  To schedule an appointment at Regis Salon, call 318-445-8414. To schedule an appointment with MasterCuts, call 318-443-6225.
